description:
exp/sql/driver: Correct package name in comment.

IIRC, package sql used to be called db. There was one occurrence
of the old name in a comment.

messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

On Fri, Nov 25, 2011 at 7:54 AM, <bsiegert@gmail.com> wrote:

> Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com,
>
> Message:
> Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),
>
> I'd like you to review this change to
> https://go.googlecode.com/hg/
>
>
> Description:
> exp/sql/driver: Correct package name in comment.
>
> IIRC, package sql used to be called db. There was one occurrence
> of the old name in a comment.
>
> Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5431075/<http://codereview.appspot.com/5431075/>
>
> Affected files:
>  M src/pkg/exp/sql/driver/driver.**go
>
>
> Index: src/pkg/exp/sql/driver/driver.**go
> ==============================**==============================**=======
> --- a/src/pkg/exp/sql/driver/**driver.go
> +++ b/src/pkg/exp/sql/driver/**driver.go
> @@ -7,7 +7,7 @@
>  //
>  // Code simply using databases should use package sql.
>  //
> -// Drivers only need to be aware of a subset of Go's types.  The db
> package
> +// Drivers only need to be aware of a subset of Go's types.  The sql
> package
>  // will convert all types into one of the following:
>  //
>  //   int64
>
>
>

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=5213cbd70274 ***

exp/sql/driver: Correct package name in comment.

IIRC, package sql used to be called db. There was one occurrence
of the old name in a comment.

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5431075

Committer: Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>

subject: code review 5431075: exp/sql/driver: Correct package name in comment.
